ReplicaDead.summary: This class is very helpful, because when a replica go dies, it necessary delete this from the system. This class must be call when a replica go died.

ReplicaDeadC.summary: This costructor allow you create a new instance of this class.
ReplicaDeadC.param: This parameter contain information from a replica, i.e -> public key, IActorRef and id.

ActorRef.summary: This property contains all information neccesary to delete a replica when this go dead.
